alert.note: Alert for Kingsbury (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 1:56PM MST until December 13 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to one quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa, southwest Minnesota and east central South Dakota. * WHEN...Until noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Isolated power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the this evening`s and Tuesday morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of freezing drizzle continue through the evening. Freezing rain will develop after midnight. As temperatures warm Tuesday morning freezing rain will change to rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
